doctor.name: Dr. Md. Mohsin Howlader
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Mohsin Howlader is a Cancer Specialist in Barisal. His qualification is MBBS, FCPS (Radiotherapy). He is a Consultant, Radiotherapy at Sher-E-Bangla Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at South Apollo Diagnostic Complex, Barisal. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Mohsin Howlader at South Apollo Diagnostic Complex, Barisal is 6pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. A.N.M. Mainul Islam
doctor.info: Dr. A.N.M. Mainul Islam is a Cancer Specialist in Barisal. His qualification is MBBS (Dhaka), BCS (Health), MPhil (Radiotherapy). He is a Assistant Professor & Head, Radiotherapy at Sher-E-Bangla Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Barisal. Practicing hour of Dr. A.N.M. Mainul Islam at Popular Diagnostic Center, Barisal is 5:30pm to 7pm (Closed: Thu & Friday).
